desc: Le Moné is a new type of contemporary aperitif — a first of its kind spirit. It combines the refreshment of fresh squeezed meyer lemon with 100% organic agave to create a mindful spirit that’s delivered directly to your door for great nights and good mornings. Simple ingredients done brilliantly and ready to drink.

layout.text: Le Moné is a Meyer lemon apéritif made with 100% organic blue agave that delivers light & bright refreshment for great nights and good mornings.
